In order for the app to function properly, it\'s important to make a few adjustments that allow it to run in the background.\n\nKindly click the button below and follow the steps tailored to your device specifications.
You can find detailed instructions under the \'Important Notes\' section within this app.

Apps running in the background may be halted by the Android system for battery preservation (Battery Optimization). This could lead to disruptions in app functionality shortly after your screen turns off.
To prevent such occurrences, it's important to deactivate battery optimization for this app, in addition to adjusting specific settings based on your device's manufacturer and Android version.

Step-by-step guides is here to assist you in rectifying this situation.

Please follow the instructions that align with your device's specifications:

..specifications..
The first guide: Dontkillmyapp.com 
The second guide: Bark.us
Please be aware that the app\'s functionality might be affected when the device is in battery-saver mode.

You may receive messages from your device's system regarding the app, such as 'The app may drain your battery by keeping your system awake. Would you like to close it\?' or 'Frequently refreshes in the background. Force stop to save power.'
These messages are not a cause for concern since the app typically utilizes minimal resources, averaging around 8 hours per night while you're asleep.
This behavior is due to our need to maintain a wake lock to keep the sensor active.

For optimal performance, we recommend ensuring your device is adequately charged before using the app. Additionally, consider closing unnecessary running apps before launching ours.
In instances where your device\'s RAM is insufficient, the app may cease to function.\nTo ensure uninterrupted app usage, consider closing unnecessary applications to free up RAM space.
For the app to be able to function, please grant the essential \'Show Notification\' permission.
